member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndex
member.summary:
A type that represents the expected JSON format in an attributes index file.
The attributes index file maps attribute names to wrapper types, along with metadata.
These attribute names must match the attribute names used on methods which are expected to be wrapped by NETMetaCoder's generated code.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndex.Attributes
member.summary: The collection of as expected to be found in the attributes index file.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndex.Attribute
member.summary: The type representing a single attribute description, as expected to be found in the attributes index file.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndex.Attribute.Name
member.summary: The attribute name, as it is expected to match in the code that is being rewritten.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndex.Attribute.Order
member.summary:
The order with which to wrap the code, as defined by this attribute's .
This has an effect only when target multiple attributes the generate wrapper code.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndex.Attribute.Wrapper
member.summary: The name of the wrapper code which defines how the wrapper syntax will be generated for this attribute.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndexReader
member.summary: A helper class that finds and reads the attributes index file.

member.name: M:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.AttributesIndexReader.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the attributes index file.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.CopyAssemblyFiles
member.summary: An MSBuild task that copies assembly files to a given destination, to help with bundling this library's resources.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.CopyAssemblyFiles.AssemblyFilePaths
member.summary: The assembly files to copy.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.CopyAssemblyFiles.DestinationDirectory
member.summary: The destination directory where the assembly files are to be copied.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GatherPackagedDependencies
member.summary: An MSBuild task that gathers dependencies that are necessary for bundling this library.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GatherPackagedDependencies.ReferencedDlls
member.summary: A ; separated list of paths to DLLs that are referenced by this library.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GatherPackagedDependencies.DllsToPackage
member.summary: The DLLs to package as dependencies of this library.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GenerateTargetsFile
member.summary:
An MSBuild task that reads file NETMetaCoder.MSBuild-template.targets and produces file NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.targets.
The generated file is used by projects that depend on this library's NuGet package to load the necessary MSBuild tasks.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GenerateTargetsFile.TargetsFilePath
member.summary: The file path to NETMetaCoder.MSBuild-template.targets.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GenerateTargetsFile.PackageId
member.summary: The name of this library's package.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GenerateTargetsFile.Version
member.summary: This library's package version.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.GenerateTargetsFile.TargetFrameworkMoniker
member.summary: The target framework moniker of this library.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.LogLevel
member.summary: The logging level to use when printing messages produced by this library.

member.name: F:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.LogLevel.Quiet
member.summary: No informational logs are printed.

member.name: F:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.LogLevel.Normal
member.summary: Only information in the form of a summary and once-off messages are logged.

member.name: F:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.LogLevel.Loud
member.summary: Messages produced by looping over collections and detailed descriptions of this library's actions are logged.

member.name: T:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax
member.summary: An MSBuild task that scans a project that depends on this library and rewrites the syntax where necessary.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.ProjectRootDirectory
member.summary: The path to the root directory of the project that this library is a dependency of.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.OutputDirectoryName
member.summary: The path to the directory where the rewritten syntax will be stored.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.CompilationUnits
member.summary: An array of paths to the code files that are to be compiled, before this library processes any files.
member.remarks: This library works by redirecting MSBuild to compile processed files, instead of the original files in the codebase.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.LogLevel
member.summary: The logging level to apply when executing this MSBuild task.

member.name: P:NETMetaCoder.MSBuild.RewriteProjectSyntax.NewCompilationUnits
member.summary: An array of paths to the code files that are to be compiled, after this library has processed a project's files.
member.remarks: This library works by redirecting MSBuild to compile processed files, instead of the original files in the codebase.
